localization.UseSystemCursorHelp: Check this if you think that cursor is too slow.
localization.ScrollWithWasdHelp: Enable scrolling with WASD. Disable this option if you want to use [A/S] as Attack-Stop hotkeys.
localization.CreditsEngineAndGameDesign: MFM Catalytic Engine and Game Design
localization.EndGameConfirm: Are you sure you want to end game?
localization.HeroDamageDescription: Hero attacks do reduced damage to Fortified armor.
localization.PiersingDamageDescription: Piercing attacks do extra damage to Unarmored units and Light armor, and reduced damage to Fortified, Normal armor, and Heroes.
localization.MagicDamageDescription: Magic attacks do extra damage against Light and Heavy armor, and reduced damage to Normal, Fortified armor, and Heroes.
localization.NormalDamageDescription: Normal attacks do extra damage against Normal armor, and reduced damage to Fortified armor.
localization.SiedgeDamageDescription: Siege attacks do extra damage to Fortified armor and Unarmored units, and reduced damage to Normal armor and Heroes.
localization.AstralDamageDescription: Astral attacks do full damage to all armor types.
localization.ArmorTypeNoneDescription: Unarmored takes extra damage from Piercing, and Siege attacks.
localization.ArmorTypeNormalDescription: Normal armor takes extra damage from Normal attacks, reduces damage from Piercing, Magic, and Siege attacks.
localization.ArmorTypeLightDescription: Light armor takes extra damage from Piercing and Magic attacks.
localization.ArmorTypeHeavyDescription: Heavy armor takes extra damage from Magic attacks.
localization.ArmorTypeHeroDescription: Heroes take reduced damage from Piercing, Magic, Spell, and Siege attacks.
localization.ArmorTypeFortifiedDescription: Fortified armor greatly reduces Piercing, Magic, Hero, and Normal attacks, but takes extra damage from Siege attacks.
localization.ArmorTypeDevineDescription: Fortified armor greatly reduces Piercing, Magic, Hero, and Normal attacks, but takes extra damage from Siege attacks.
localization.HelpContent: [Keyboard arrows] - scroll screen. [Space Bar] - snap/unsnap camera to Hero. [Mouse click] - select units / smart action (if unit seected). [Ctrl + Mouse click] - select unit (if another selected). [Esc] - cancel selected action / game menu. [A] - attack. [M] - move. [S] - stop. [H] - select Hero. [1-9] - skills hotkeys. Double click on spell to activate. You can use unit control panel at the right bottom corner of the screen to order units to perform actions like move or attack. If you have problem with cursor moving too slow - go to options and check 'Use System Cursor'.
localization.HelpContentShort: * Keyboard arrows - scroll screen. * Left mouse click - select units / select units / smart action (if unit seected). * Ctrl + Left mouse click - select unit (if another selected). * Use unit control panel at the right bottom corner of the screen to order units to perform actions like move or attack. * Esc - cancel selected action. * Double click on spell to activate. You can get more detailed help by clicking 'Help' in game menu.
